isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - CHANGE OIL LAMP (COL) - SYSTEM FUNCTIONS

svcproc.title: SYSTEM FUNCTIONS
svcproc.para: The amber Change Oil Lamp will be illuminated when a customer programmable service interval has been exceeded. These limits may be set up in terms of vehicle miles, hours or calculated fuel consumption. These service interval limits may be adjusted or the Change Oil Lamp feature may be turned on or off using the EST tool.
